exceptions.tactic: intros T F1 F2 H1 H2.

ctx: intros T' F1 F2 H1 H2.
intros T' F1 F2 H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: specialize (H1 (fun P => forall x, P x -> ball x eps (lim F2))).
exceptions.exn: The reference eps was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros T' F1 F2 H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: specialize (H2 (fun P => forall x, P x -> ball x eps (lim F1))).
exceptions.exn: The reference eps was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros T' F1 F2 H1 H2.

original: intros T F1 F2 H1 H2. unfold close. intros eps. specialize (H1 (fun P => forall x, P x -> ball x eps (lim F2))). specialize (H2 (fun P => forall x, P x -> ball x eps (lim F1))). intros x Hx. apply H2. apply H1. apply Hx.
